external_games.name: Rings of Medusa II: The Return of Medusa
Rings of Medusa II: The Return of Medusa

name: Rings of Medusa II: The Return of Medusa
summary: Rings of Medusa II: The Return of Medusa is a RPG released in 1991. A version for the Commodore 64 was supposed to be released as well, but was cancelled.
